Html:
First big tanks for this program as it made me a better player DPS wise, and cut my research down by 80% ore so.

I have two low priority requests  if possible , for when after you have run the optimizer.

  1. A list of the old gems that get replaced and a list of the new gems that are needed
  2. A list of the changes that are taking place

I was thinking of something like this

http://tweakers.net/ext/f/bGcSohKWRjGBqOAYZz5xg3fV/full.png

Preferably whit text that you can copy / paste
We already have this in Rawr3

Not trying to complain but unles you say the online version is better, i like and prefer the (offline) old version mouths more, even do i have to download updates all the time

And the online version dose have a list, but also dose not make a list like in the example i suggested.

 

But if you not willing to put the time in it for it i understand, and i am all ready happy whit what i got :D
You can install Rawr3 to be usable offline.  Just right-click anywhere on the window.
